metadata.synopsis: PAD for party banter when players enter SCL, after the cutscene (either SCL_EntryPoint_Mountain.lsj or SCL_EntryPoint_Underdark.lsj, depending on which entrance is used). Lines are generic enough about the shadow curse/look of the land that they work for both entrances to SCL. One line each from two companions if 2+ companions present.
metadata.how_to_trigger: After the SCL entry cutscene plays for either entrance, should get a 1 line each party banter from 2 companions if 2+ companions present.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I've never seen darkness like this before. It's unsettling.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: It's the only way to Moonrise Towers. We have to push through.
